trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of choices for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

Accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific.Choices%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> object retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection> object.

This collection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface (through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ArrayListCollectionBase> object); it implements all properties and methods of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> object to the end of a collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> object to add to the end of the collection.
Adds a choice at the location in the collection specified by the index parameter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A value of -1 for the `index` parameter specifies that the command is added to the end of the collection.
The location in the collection at which to add choice.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> to add to the collection.
Retrieves an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> objects from the collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> objects contained by the collection.
Clears the collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This method is not available in the read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interface.
You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A> method for all the classes where this method applies.

For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection.Clear%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>, it clears all the choices in the collection.
Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.
Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> item in the collection, by index.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The index number of the item to retrieve from the collection.
The object at the given index in the collection.
Removes the specified choice.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> to remove
Removes the item at the specified index.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The index number of the item to remove.
